title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Fanatics CEO Michael Rubin on Business, Evolving and Ryen Russillo on Cavs/Mitchell Trade, Belichick Doubts
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Fanatics CEO Michael Rubin on Business, Evolving and Ryen Russillo on Cavs/Mitchell Trade, Belichick Doubts
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, Fanatics CEO Michael Rubin (3:00) outlines his strategy to take the world’s leading licensed sports merchandiser into gambling and NFT’s, why he got out of his ownership stakes in the Sixers, if he’s ever regretted selling a company, and how he stays on the front end of cultural trends as he gets older.

Then (28:00), Ryen Russillo - Host of the Ryen Russillo Podcast - reacts to the trade sending Donovan Mitchell to the Cavs for draft picks and parts, and discusses if Tom and Gisele’s reported marital problems should be a daily sports topic, and what it would take for Belichick to retire.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
